articles.title: Tiger Woods touches down in Philadelphia to attend crunch anti-LIV PGA Tour meeting - Daily Mail
articles.description: Woods took off from Stuart, Florida on Tuesday lunchtime and two hours later had landed on the east coast, just a half an hour drive from Wilmington, Delaware for the crunch meeting.
